name: mydayTime
0:
”Alexa, open day time for the time right now”
”Alexa, open day time and day of August 1st 2017”
”Alexa, ask day time for what day falls on December 1st 2017”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: day time
des:
Day time will tell you the time for eastern region as well as tell you the day of week a given date falls on. For example, after opening day time say "what day falls on December 21st 2017 " and day time will respond with the day of the week. Go ahead and try it!

***Results may vary, for serious and emergency situations please double check another source, thank you!***
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
